## IClientConfig interface

Configuration used for initializing the Eppo client


[numInitialRequestRetries?](./vercel-edge-sdk.iclientconfig.numinitialrequestretries.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Number of additional times the initial configuration request will be attempted if it fails. This is the request typically synchronously waited (via await) for completion. A small wait will be done between requests. (Default: 1)


</td></tr>

</td><td>


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

</td></tr>

</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Throw an error if unable to fetch an initial configuration during initialization. (default: true)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[vercelParams](./vercel-edge-sdk.iclientconfig.vercelparams.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

{ edgeConfig: string; edgeConfigStoreId: string; vercelApiToken: string; }


</td><td>

Params for setting up connection with Vercel

edgeConfig - string given on creation of Vercel Edge Config Store. edgeConfigStoreId - id of created Vercel Edge Config Store. vercelApiToken - Vercel API token with write access. Needed to write configs to Vercel Edge Config Store.


</td></tr>
